name: band_aid_tape
description: Johnson & Johnson Hurt Free Paper Tape. Firmly secure dressings around wounds with BAND-AID Brand of First Aid Products Paper Tape. Ideal for when frequent bandage changes are required, this tape is breathable, free of natural rubber latex, and dermatologically tested to be non-irritating. It's easy and painless to remove and tears easily, so it can be customized to fit any size bandage. It comes in one roll measuring 1 inch by 12 yards.
